A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars fans are always offended one way or another. Too much like the original trilogy they hate it\, make a movie that can stand on its own and ignores every rumor out there they hate it. Quit living in the expanded universe\, get over yourselves\, and just enjoy the ride. I thought this movie was well done though not without it's flaws (Mary Poppins y'all). I loved how Rian Johnson would lead you to expect one thing then did another. I feel if he played into everyone's expectations it would have been predictable and a big disappointment. I left the theater feeling satisfied but not necessarily in a rush to go back and see it right away but it was worth the price of admission.
